tool.name: Cp2kPrep
tool.description: : Helper bb to prepare inputs for the CP2K QM tool module.

param.name: input_inp_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Input configuration file (CP2K run options). Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_inp_path
param.label: output INP,IN,TXT name
param.help: Output CP2K input configuration file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: simulation_type
param.label: simulation_type
param.help: Default options for the cp2k_in file. Each creates a different inp file.

param.name: cell_cutoff
param.label: cell_cutoff
param.help: CP2K cell cutoff, to build the cell around the system (only used if input_pdb_path is defined).
